content: current stitch and the next stitch *** work in stockinette until the work measures 3 inches 8cm from the thumb hole or your desired length i-cord bind-off once you have finished working your last round remove bor marker cast on 3 stitches using the knitted cast-on *knit the first two stitches ssk then transfer the 3 stitches on the right needle onto the left needle* repeat from * to * until all stitches have been worked bind off the remaining 3 stitches break yarn leaving a 6-inch 15cm tail thread the tail through a tapestry needle and use it to sew the beginning and end of the i-cord together weave the yarn tail into the i-cord or your preferred method of weaving in the tail *** working the thumb transfer the 16 on-hold stitches onto your needles and join in new yarn leaving a 5-inch 13cm tail knit one round at the beginning of the next round m1r you will now have 17 stitches on your needles work 8 rounds in stockinette approximately ¾ inch 2cm or your desired length bind-off using i-cord bind-off technique as described above thread the tail at the base of the thumb through a tapestry needle use the tail to sew the hole at the base of the thumb shut then weave the tail in to finish *** repeat instructions for the other glove block your gloves if desired you re all done thank you so much for using my pattern i would love it if you shared your work with me on ravelry or on instagram tag me @dotcardigan and use the hashtag #autumnrosegloves happy knitting if you d like to send me a tip as way to say thank-you my kofi page is https //ko-fi com/dotcardigan
